entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
